mapper.select: SELECT ai.fUuid AS 'uuid', ai.fAppName AS 'appName' FROM t_apply_info ai

SELECT ai.fUuid AS 'uuid', ai.fAppName AS 'appName', ai.fPackageName AS 'packageName', ai.fID AS 'id', ai.fColor AS 'color', ai.fPosandcolor AS 'posandcolor' FROM t_apply_info ai WHERE 1=1
AND ai.fAppName LIKE '%${applyInfoCriteria.appName}%'
